property.name: Text
property.description:
Type: "C",
Text content for target cell.

property.name: Field
property.description:
Type: "C",
Dynamic content (from JSON) to populate the cell.

property.name: StyleName
property.description:
Type: "C",
Style name for this cell.

property.name: InlineStyle
property.description:
Type: "C",
Inline style definiton for this cell.

property.name: Row
property.description:
Type: "N",
Relative row in section for thi cell.

property.name: Cols
property.description:
Type: "N",
Number of Columns that represent this cell (merges columns together)

property.name: Rows
property.description:
Type: "N",
Number of Rows that represent this cell (merges columns together)

property.name: FormulaTemplate
property.description:
Type: "C",
EXCEL formula to set in cell (uses template for runtime substiutions).

property.name: conditionIndex
property.description:
Type: "N",
Optional index of condition that applies

methodref.name: NewInstance
methodref.description: Create a new object instance of the same type.
